thread.section_title: Logoscientist Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Logoscientist | logoscientist.net
thread.title: Kammy Hodges

author: Kammy Hodges
title: Kammy Hodges
text: I don't know how to begin expressing my contentment with Logo Scientist. From the beginning of the process the salesperson had a sincere approach that made me trust that my best interest was at heart. Having my case manager, Steve, made a world of difference. He was patient and persistent and adapted to all my needs no matter what challenge arose. I love the media they created and I couldn't have gotten this level of performance at a better price anywhere. Thank you so much and I highly recommend LOGO Scientist and their team!
